document.full_text: the league enlisted david boies, who represented al gore in the bush vs. gore case following the 2000 election, and paul clement, who served for three years as the u. s. solicitor general for president george w. bush.
document.title: n.f.l. hires attorneys for suit against players
lines_and_colors: the league enlisted david boies, who represented al gore in the bush vs. gore case following the 2000 election, and paul clement, who served for three years as the u. s. solicitor general for president george w. bush.
